tha-ap404:4.3: Ābādhiko ca so → ābādhiko garu (bj) | ābādhiko va yo (pts-vp-pli1ed)
tha-ap404:5.4: udapajjatha → upapajjatha (bj) | āsi tāvade (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed, mr)
tha-ap404:6.3: Vāḷā → vyagghā (bj) | bālā ca (sya1ed, sya2ed) | vālā ca (pts-vp-pli1ed)
tha-ap404:11.1: Yaṃ pūritaṃ → taṃ pūritaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed) | sappurisa (mr)
tha-ap404:11.4: sadā hohi tuvaṃ → yadā hosi tuvaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed) | sadā hohiti tvaṃ (mr)
